content: The passive ability usually provides a general stat boost in an area, while the active ability can be activated to provide a much stronger buff that can change the tide of a fight.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Vessels.md', within the main section titled 'Vessels'.
The content is as follows:
The passive ability usually provides a general stat boost in an area, while the active ability can be activated to provide a much stronger buff that can change the tide of a fight.
